name: Mercy
passiveSkills: Grant Immunity to all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle
Remove All Crave, Heal Reduction and Heal Block effects, including Silver and Innate effects, from each ally and Heal them for 100% of their MAX HP when each ally dies for the first time in battle
Grant the following 3 Blessings of Mercy to each ally whenever this talisman becomes active and at the start of your turn: 35% Chance to take no damage when attacked
35% Chance to Remove a Negative Effect, including Silver effects, when taking damage
35% Chance to gain a Random Healing or Defensive Effect, including Golden effects, for 2 turns after every action.
